name: Wisper (NoahSmith)
description:
Wisper is a gravity-driven 2D platformer where your goal is to guide a spirit through the world by turning the level itself and utilizing gravity.

This web version of the project uses only keyboard/mouse controls. The original project also had the ability to use a Nintendo Joy-con as a controller via Bluetooth but that functionality was not compatible with the WebGL build so it had to be excluded.

This was a group project, with the members being Jonathan So, Charley Link, Vince DiCocco, Ryan Hakius, and myself.

Even though it is not usable in this version of the projet, credit for the library used to connect and use Joy-cons to Looking-Glass on Github (https://github.com/Looking-Glass/JoyconLib)
